definition: to meet by chance/to run into sb/chance encounter

sentences.english: Many years were to pass before we met up again.
sentences.chinese: 过了许多年本人们才再度邂逅。

sentences.english: Men always expect to meet beautiful women at the Laundromat.
sentences.chinese: 男人总是期望能在洗衣店邂逅美丽女人。

sentences.english: Love is an ocean world, meet meet if miss.
sentences.chinese: 爱情世界是一个海洋，相遇邂逅了若错过。

sentences.english: I came to scootering late in life.
sentences.chinese: 在我的生活中，与踏板车邂逅是很晚的事情了。

sentences.english: A chance meeting with her has changed his life.
sentences.chinese: 一次与她的邂逅相遇改变了他的一生。

sentences.english: You brush past people. People bump into you.
sentences.chinese: 你和人们擦肩而过，邂逅相遇。

sentences.english: The chancy meeting in Singapore made the situation worse.
sentences.chinese: 在新加坡的邂逅更是加剧了这种情况。

sentences.english: Women tend to be pickier, especially for short-term sexual encounters.
sentences.chinese: 而女性则显得挑剔，尤其是短期的性邂逅。

sentences.english: Want to meet up so I can excite your natural frequency?
sentences.chinese: 想要以此邂逅吗？那么我可以激活你的自然的频率。

sentences.english: When they met, both were self-employed. Both smoked.
sentences.chinese: 她和他邂逅时，两人都是自由职业者，都抽烟。

sentences.english: Like the meeting of the seagulls and the waves we meet and come near .
sentences.chinese: 象海鸥和波涛的相遇，我们邂逅，我们靠近。

sentences.english: But there have been many, many encounters.
sentences.chinese: 但的确，我邂逅过很多的男人。

sentences.english: The lovers meet, but meet too late.
sentences.chinese: 有情人邂逅却相见恨晚。

sentences.english: I encountered an old friend at Rome.
sentences.chinese: 我在罗马邂逅了一个老朋友。

sentences.english: It was the encounter with Mary that delayed him.
sentences.chinese: 就是由于同玛丽的邂逅相遇而耽搁了他。

definition: meet by chance/have a chance encounter
to agree (on a meeting place, date etc)/to reach agreement/to make an appointment
in love with/to feel deeply attached to
to admire wholeheartedly/to fall in love with
to accompany sb/to accompany each other
to wander about unhurriedly/to linger/to loiter
to get to know each other/acquaintance
